verses.name: Matthew 22:21
verses.text: They say unto him, Cesar’s. Then saith he unto them, Render therefore unto Cesar the things which are Cesar’s; and unto God the things that are God’s.

verses.name: Matthew 22:22
verses.text: When they had heard these words, they marvelled, and left him, and went their way.

verses.name: Matthew 22:23
verses.text: The same day came to him the Sadducees, which say that there is no resurrection, and asked him,

verses.name: Matthew 22:24
verses.text: Saying, Master, Moses said, If a man die, having no children, his brother shall marry his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
